models.speedTooltip: Default is 1.0 and 1.05 would be 5% faster playback

tutorial.exampleUser: This is an example saved conversation item.
tutorial.exampleAssistant: Feel free to explore and add your own conversations.

settings.title: Settings Quick Guide
settings.welcome: Welcome to The MinimalChat Configuration Page! Follow this short guided tour to learn about the configuration experience.
settings.gestureDesc:
1.) Double tap anywhere in the configuration panel to quickly collapse and expand the model selection panel to the left.

2.) Swipe to the right from the edge of the screen to quickly close the settings page.
settings.modelPanelDesc: Quickly select different models. The configuration panel to the right will update with the appropriate items.
settings.modelGroupsDesc: Models of the same provider are grouped together for better organization. Click on a group to expand or collapse it.
settings.generalConfigDesc: The general configuration option houses settings and actions that are more MinimalChat specific.
settings.configSectionDesc: This section displays the configuration options for the selected model. Adjust settings like API keys, temperature, max tokens, and more.
settings.systemPromptDesc: Enter a system prompt if you desire. This prompt will be used by the model to guide its responses.
settings.savedPromptsDesc: View and manage your saved system prompts here. Click on a prompt to select it, or click the trash icon to delete it.
settings.contrastDesc: Enable or disable higher contrast messages for more distinction between messages. This results in a more classic message bubble design.
settings.importExportDesc: Manage your settings by exporting them to a JSON file for backup or importing settings from a JSON file.

main.title: MinimalChat Tutorial
main.welcome: Welcome to MinimalChat! Follow this quick guided tour to learn about the app. It highlights useful information, features, and gestures!
main.configDesc: Visit the configuration page to set up various LLM models and services!
main.swipeRightDesc: Access the Configuration page quickly by swiping right from the edge of the screen!
main.swipeLeftDesc: Access the Conversations Management page quickly by swiping left from the edge of the screen!
main.editMsgDesc: Double-click any user message in the conversation to enter edit mode and regenerate the response!
main.copyMsgDesc: Tap the label of any message to quickly copy the text to your clipboard.
main.quickActionsDesc: Double tap the messages list to open a quick actions menu for deleting or starting a new conversation.
main.visionDesc: Start a Vision request by entering your prompt and choosing an image via the upload button!
main.uploadDesc: Easily add the contents of valid files to the current conversation context.
main.githubDesc: Click the header icon to navigate to the GitHub repo where you can submit issues or ideas!
main.completeDesc: Thanks for following the tutorial! Dive in and start using the app however you like. Happy chatting!

desktop.title: MinimalChat Walkthrough
desktop.welcome: Welcome to MinimalChat! Follow this quick guided tour to learn about the app. It highlights useful information, features, and gestures!
desktop.modelSelectorDesc: In the desktop layout, you can quickly switch the model being used for requests.
desktop.conversationsDesc: This area displays saved conversations and actions for managing them.
desktop.editTitleDesc: Double-click a saved conversation to activate edit mode and change the conversation title.
desktop.configDesc: Visit the configuration page to set up various LLM models and services!
desktop.editMsgDesc: Double-click any user message in the conversation to enter edit mode and regenerate the response!
desktop.copyMsgDesc: Tap the label of any message to quickly copy the text to your clipboard.
desktop.visionDesc: Start a Vision request by entering your prompt and choosing an image via the upload button!
desktop.uploadDesc: Easily add the contents of valid files (non-images, etc.) to the current conversation context.
desktop.githubDesc: Click the header icon to navigate to the GitHub repo where you can submit issues or ideas!
desktop.completeDesc: Thanks for following the tutorial! Dive in and start using the app however you like. Happy chatting!
